name: Resume
body:
### James Schlessinger  
237 Cumberland St #3 | San Francisco, CA 94114 | (413) 537-0411  
james.schlessinger@gmail.com  

*****

#### Technical Toolbox
**Languages:** Ruby, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and some knowledge of SQL, Python, and C  
**Frameworks and Libraries:** Rails, Backbone, Underscore, jQuery, RSpec  
**Other:** Version control using Git  

#### Education
**[App Academy](www.appacademy.io)** - *San Francisco, CA*
* 9-week intensive web development course
* Completed in July 2013
* Full-stack development with emphasis on Ruby, Rails, and JavaScript  

**Brown University** - *Providence, RI*
* BA in Music Theory with honors, May 2007
* Graduated *magna cum laude*  

**Additional courses:**
* *UC Berkeley*
  * C Language Programming I (summer 2012)
  * UNIX/Linux I (summer 2012)
* *Udacity.com*
  * Intro to Computer Science (fall 2012)

#### Work Experience
DEC. 2007 - AUG 2009: **Boston Ballet: _Summer Programs Assistant_** - *Boston, MA*  
* Overhauled my division's website using Ektron
* Carried out the various administrative tasks associated with the Summer Dance Program
* Handled numerous concurrent independent and collaborative projects and met firm deadlines

SUMMER 2007 - **CNR/Vassar College: _NSF/REU Student Research Assistant_** - *Pisa, Italy*
* Aided in developing a link between Italian and English computational linguistics corpuses using TimeML
TimeBank
* Problem-solved in collaboration with Italian computer scientists  

SUMMER 2005 - **Event Artists: _Staff/Performer_** - *San Francisco, CA*
* Designed and created a comprehensive company website
* Collaborated in the performance, recording, sound mixing, and promotion of a critically acclaimed album * Performed improvised music alongside other experienced musicians at events in venues such as the San
Francisco Museum of Modern Art, the Metreon, Great American Music Hall, and the Asian Art Museum  

#### Projects
**Billbo** - [billbo.herokuapp.com](billbo.herokuapp.com)
* Single-page app that splits and settles bills among friends
* Backbone.js front-end framework
* Demo users: bob@example.com, ted@example.com, password: "password"  

**DrinkPicker** - [drinkpicker.herokuapp.com](drinkpicker.herokuapp.com)
* Suggests random cocktails at the click of a button
* Rails back-end
* Admin console for adding, editing, and deleting drinks, employing AJAX and nested forms
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
